nodes.documentation:
@title PROPS Token
@dev ERC20 Token (PROPS)
 * PROPS are divisible by 1e18 base
units referred to as 'AttoPROPS'.
 * PROPS are displayed using 18 decimal places of precision.
 * 1 PROPS is equivalent to:
  1 * 1e18 == 1e18 == One Quintillion AttoPROPS
 * 1 Billion PROPS (total supply) is equivalent to:
  1000000000 * 1e18 == 1e27 == One Octillion AttoPROPS
nodes.name: PropsToken

nodes.documentation:
@notice Is the address allowed to transfer
@return true if the sender can transfer
nodes.name: isUserAllowedToTransfer

nodes.documentation: @notice Enabling / Disabling transfers of non whitelisted users
nodes.name: setWhitelistedOnly

nodes.documentation: @notice Adding a user to the whitelist
nodes.name: whitelistUserForTransfers

nodes.documentation: @notice Remove a user from the whitelist
nodes.name: blacklistUserForTransfers
transfer
transferFrom
transferPreSigned
approvePreSigned
